name: Quantum Cubes
description:
Quantum Cubes is a multiplayer platformer game where you have to avoid touching the ground or the pink obstacles. You can create a room and play with your friends or join your friend's rooms!

Your score is calculate by dividing the time you played by the number of times you touched the ground/obstacles.

IMPORTANT 

If there are more than 20 players playing the game you may not be able to play, If that will happen I will upgrade my networking solution.
